title: The Desert Virgin
description: Cameron Knight is a fearless troubleshooter on a mission in the desert kingdom of BaslaamLeanna DeMarco is a ballerina; shes been abducted to dance for the sultan of BaslaamWhen the sultan offers Leanna to Cam, he sees a way to escape with her across the sands. But shes temptation! Can Cam resist taking the sultans gift.
author: Sandra Marton
